name: Avatrr
description: Connect to an Avatrr avatar as external channel (WebSocket)

configSchema.name: avatrrUrl
configSchema.label: Avatrr URL
configSchema.description: Base URL of the Avatrr instance (e.g. http://localhost:3000)

configSchema.name: avatarId
configSchema.label: Avatar ID
configSchema.description: ID of the avatar to register as external channel
